items.title: Apple iPhone 17 vs. iPhone 16
items.summary: Apple's iPhone 17 may look like business as usual at first glance, but this year's update is a bigger jump than we've come to expect from the vanilla line. In fact, the jump from the iPhone 16 to the iPhone 17 feels like one of the more meaningful generational steps we've seen in recent years. Of câ€¦

items.title: SpaceX wants to put 1 million solar-powered data centers into orbit
